metadata.title: CVE-2020-7071 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In PHP versions 7.3.x below 7.3.26, 7.4.x below 7.4.14 and 8.0.0, when validating URL with functions like filter_var($url, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL), PHP will accept an URL with invalid password as valid URL. This may lead to functions that rely on URL being valid to mis-parse the URL and produce wrong data as components of the URL.

notes.note: mdeslaur> original fix in 7.3.26 introduced a regression and was reverted with an improved fix in 7.3.27

criterions.comment: php7.4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.4.16-1ubuntu2').
